title: Move in before Labor Day!
neighborhood: 1129 S Eaton Cir, Castle Rock, CO 80104
map_address: 1129 S Eaton Cir near Plum Creek Parkway
posting_body: Up to 1 month free on select apartment homes!
Welcome to Vistas at Plum Creek Apartments
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 650 Sq.

Just outside of Vistas at Plum Creek Apartments you will find the charming neighborhood of Castle Rock, located a convenient 40 minutes from Denver, but with enough dining, shopping, and outdoor activities to rival the big city.
Our residents love going for hikes at nearby Castlewood Canyon State Park and following up an active day with drinks and dinner at Union Bistro or Castle Café.
There is something for everyone at Vistas at Plum Creek.

9-Foot Ceilings, Kitchen Pantry*, In-Home Washer & Dryer, Plank-Style Wood Flooring*, Beautiful Renovated Apartment Homes, Vaulted Ceiling & Skylights*, Wood Burning Fireplace, Ceiling Fans*, Private Patio or Balcony*, Beautiful Kitchen with Full Modern Appliance Package, Central Heat & Air Conditioning

Sparkling Swimming Pool, Valet Waste Doorstep Rubbish Collection Service, Resident Clubhouse with TV Lounge & Complimentary Wi-Fi, Onsite Guest Suite Available, Pet-Friendly Community with Bark Park, Beautiful Courtyard with Community BBQ Grills, 24-Hour Fitness Center with Free Weights, On-Site Management with Courtesy Package Acceptance, & 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance
We love your pets and are excited to welcome them to their new home!
We allow two pets per apartment home with a combined weight not exceed 160 lbs.
Cats and dogs are welcome at our community although some age, weight and breed restrictions apply.
